(Same as PSYC 302 1)
Freshmen are NOT allowed to take this class. Prior completion of PSYC 110, or 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology or NBB intro courses equivalent.
course_description: Study of variable topics of special interest in neuroscience and behavioral biology. May be repeated for credit when topics vary.
